page.title: 11Where our class live.
page.content:
We did a survey of where children in class 4T live. Class 4T is a fourth year class of 22 children aged 10-11 years old.
12 children live in blocks of flats. 5 children live in terraced houses. 1 girl lives in a tower block. 2 boys live in maisonettes. 1 boy lives in a flat in a terraced house. 1 boy lives above a shop owned by his family. Most children live within walking distance of the school. On average it only takes them 5 - 10 minutes walk to school. Only 2 children have to take a bus to get to school.
